<title level="1" right="Archetype 8" pfs="Limited">[Golem Grafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=39)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 74</row>

You have replaced a portion of your body with artifice of the kind used to create [golems](/Traits.aspx?ID=220), fortifying your flesh with the unyielding might of magical constructs.

<document level="2" id="feat-1227" />

name: Golem Grafter
prerequisite: expert in Arcana and Crafting, or an ally with expert proficiency in those skills willing to augment you
prerequisite_markdown: expert in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) and [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4), or an ally with expert proficiency in those skills willing to augment you
